function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biological change and drug resistance","Impact":"Increased resistance to insecticide and drug treatments for diseases like malaria, HAT, leishmaniasis, and schistosomiasis","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative vector and pathogen control methods, reducing agrochemical use, and developing new treatments","Technologies":"Alternative vector control methods, advanced drug development technologies","People":"Global population at risk of vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Global health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Social and political change","Impact":"Changes in social, cultural, and political factors affecting the delivery of healthcare services and disease prevention initiatives","Mitigation":"Adapting healthcare services to changing social and political contexts, addressing barriers to treatment and healthcare access","Technologies":"E-health solutions, community healthcare models, policy and governance frameworks","People":"Communities and healthcare systems in regions affected by vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, policy makers, and community leaders"}]}
